name: Pickled Onion
description: Pickled Onion is a delicious Tet dish that is very popular because of its sweet and sour taste, delicious and crispy, which helps to prevent boredom with greasy, nutrient-rich, and indigestion-causing dishes such as banh chung, meat, fish, etc. This wild, idyllic place also appears on the daily rice tray because of its irresistible appeal.

name: Gac Sticky Rice
description: With the fragrant plasticity of glutinous rice mixed with the greasy taste of Gac fruit and natural bright red color, Gac sticky rice is loved by most families.

name: Authentic Pho
description: Pho is a soup consisting of bone broth, rice noodles, thinly-sliced meat (in this recipe, it's beef), and fresh garnishes.

name: Vietnamese Egg Coffee
description: Whipping an egg yolk into sweetened condensed milk will give you a meringue-like, silky, smooth fluff.
